oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Public Works Subcommittee Meeting Minutes, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Headed by Chairman Henry Lentz, the Public Works Subcommittee discussed activities that fall under the responsibility of the department. Topics included solid waste management, vehicle maintenance, and streets/road maintenance.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Public works; Meetings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
